name: Nine Paradise: The Origin
description:
This is a Roguelike card game.
In addition to hundreds of basic cards, there are also unique ways to practice martial arts and spells, and dozens of powerful magic weapons and spirits with their own characteristics, making the game play more rich.

Game features

Dynamic deck building: Choose the cards you want from more than 100 different cards during the game, combine and match them, build a powerful deck, defeat the enemy.
Random map: Maps are randomly generated every time you start a new game.
Powerful artifacts: In addition to the base cards, there are powerful artifacts, which can be used only a limited number of times.
Multiple pets: You can summon different pets to fight alongside you!

Game content

3 difficulty levels, different players can find their own difficulty.
The practice system of martial arts and magic.
More than 150 different cards.
More than 20 powerful artifacts.
More than 10 kinds of pets with their own characteristics.
More than 60 magic items.
